RAD_DATASOURCES.RELATION_WITH_PARENT: LBTBS_CONTRACT_BORROWERS.CONTRACT_REF_NO = LBTBS_BORR_SETTLE_CURR_DET.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND LBTBS_CONTRACT_BORROWERS.VERSION_NO = LBTBS_BORR_SETTLE_CURR_DET.VERSION_NO AND LBTBS_CONTRACT_BORROWERS.CUSTOMER_NO = LBTBS_BORR_SETTLE_CURR_DET.CUSTOMER_NO

LBTBS_CONTRACT_BORROWERS.CONTRACT_REF_NO = LBTBS_CONTRACT_BORR_DDPROD.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND LBTBS_CONTRACT_BORROWERS.VERSION_NO = LBTBS_CONTRACT_BORR_DDPROD.VERSION_NO AND LBTBS_CONTRACT_BORROWERS.CUSTOMER_NO = LBTBS_CONTRACT_BORR_DDPROD.CUSTOMER_NO

LBTBS_CONTRACT_BORROWERS.CONTRACT_REF_NO = LBTBS_BORROWER_ENTITIES.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND LBTBS_CONTRACT_BORROWERS.VERSION_NO = LBTBS_BORROWER_ENTITIES.VERSION_NO AND LBTBS_CONTRACT_BORROWERS.CUSTOMER_NO = LBTBS_BORROWER_ENTITIES.CUSTOMER_NO

LBTBS_CONTRACT_BORR_DDPROD.CONTRACT_REF_NO= LBTBS_BORR_PROD_LIMIT.TRANCHE_REF_NO AND LBTBS_CONTRACT_BORR_DDPROD.VERSION_NO = LBTBS_BORR_PROD_LIMIT.VERSION_NO AND LBTBS_CONTRACT_BORR_DDPROD.LIMIT_TYPE = LBTBS_BORR_PROD_LIMIT.LIMIT_TYPE AND LBTBS_CONTRACT_BORR_DDPROD.DD_PRODUCT_CODE = LBTBS_BORR_PROD_LIMIT.DRAWDOWN_PRODUCT AND LBTBS_CONTRACT_BORR_DDPROD.CUSTOMER_NO = LBTBS_BORR_PROD_LIMIT.BORROWER

RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: select CUSTOMER, GFCID, SHORTNAME, CUSTOMERNAME from (select a.customer_no as "CUSTOMER", a.gfcid as "GFCID", a.short_name as "SHORTNAME", a.customer_name1 as "CUSTOMERNAME" from oltms_customer a where a.record_stat = 'O' and not exists (select b.customer_no from LBTBS_CONTRACT_BORROWERS b where a.customer_no = b.customer_no and contract_ref_no = ? and version_no = ?) and ? = 'F' UNION select a.customer_no as "CUSTOMER", b.gfcid as "GFCID", b.short_name as "SHORTNAME", b.customer_name1 as "CUSTOMERNAME" from LBTBS_CONTRACT_BORROWERS a, oltms_customer b where b.record_stat = 'O' and a.customer_no = b.customer_no /*and a.contract_ref_no = :parameter.prm_facility_ref_no*/ and a.version_no = (select max(version_no) from LBTBS_CONTRACT_BORROWERS c where c.contract_ref_no = a.contract_ref_no) and not exists (select b.customer_no from LBTBS_CONTRACT_BORROWERS c where c.customer_no = b.customer_no and c.contract_ref_no = ? and c.version_no = ?) and ? <> 'F') d where exists (select 1 from olvws_product_customers o where o.product_code = ? and o.customer_no = d.CUSTOMER) order by CUSTOMER
SELECT customer_no, gfcid, short_name, customer_name1 FROM oltms_customer WHERE record_stat = 'O' and auth_stat = 'A'

SELECT SSI_MNEMONIC, SETTLEMENT_SEQ_NO SEQ_NO, BRANCH, PAY_ACCOUNT, RECV_ACCOUNT, COUNTERPARTY AGENT, CURRENCY FROM OLTMS_INSTR WHERE DECODE(COUNTERPARTY, 'ALL', NVL(?, ?), COUNTERPARTY) = NVL(?, ?) and branch in (GLOBAL.current_branch, 'ALL') AND DECODE(MODULE, 'AL', 'LB', MODULE) = 'LB' AND DECODE(PRODUCT_CODE, 'ALL', ?, PRODUCT_CODE) = ? AND currency in (?, '*.*') AND RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND AUTH_STAT = 'A' AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM olvws_PROD_ACNT_Access X WHERE (PAY_ACCOUNT = X.AC_GL_NO or RECV_ACCOUNT = X.AC_GL_NO) AND X.PRODUCT_CODE = ?)

SELECT ENTITY, ENTITY_NAME, ENTITY_TYPE, PHONE_NO, FAX_NO, EMAIL FROM (SELECT C.ENTITY AS "ENTITY", C.ENTITY_NAME AS "ENTITY_NAME", C.ENTITY_TYPE AS "ENTITY_TYPE", PHONE_NO AS "PHONE_NO", FAX_NO AS "FAX_NO", EMAIL AS "EMAIL" FROM OLTMS_CUSTOMER_ENTITY A, OLTMS_CUSTOMER_ENTITY_DETAILS C WHERE A.CUSTOMER_NO = ? AND A.CUSTOMER_NO = C.CUSTOMER_NO AND A.RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND A.ONCE_AUTH = 'Y' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT B.ENTITY FROM LBTBS_BORROWER_ENTITIES B WHERE B.ENTITY = C.ENTITY AND B.CUSTOMER_NO = ? AND B.CONTRACT_REF_NO = ? AND B.VERSION_NO = ? AND Drawdown_no = ?) AND ? = 'F' UNION select a.entity AS "ENTITY", b.entity_name AS "ENTITY_NAME", b.ENTITY_TYPE AS "ENTITY_TYPE", b.PHONE_NO AS "PHONE_NO", b.FAX_NO AS "FAX_NO", b.EMAIL AS "EMAIL" from LBTBS_BORROWER_ENTITIES a, oltms_customer_entity_details b where a.entity = b.entity and a.customer_no = b.customer_no and contract_ref_no = ? and a.customer_no = ? and a.version_no = (Select max(version_no) from LBTBS_BORROWER_ENTITIES where contract_ref_no = ? and a.customer_no = ?) and NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM LBTBS_BORROWER_ENTITIES c WHERE c.CONTRACT_REF_NO = ? AND c.VERSION_NO = ? AND c.CUSTOMER_NO = ? AND c.entity = a.entity AND c.Drawdown_no = ?) AND ? <> 'F') ORDER BY ENTITY

select PRODUCT_CODE, PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION from OLTMS_PRODUCT where module = 'LB' AND PRODUCT_TYPE = 'L' AND RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND ONCE_AUTH = 'Y' AND PRODUCT_CODE IN (SELECT DISTINCT(BORROWER_DRAWDOWN_PRODUCT) FROM LBTMS_FACILITY_DD_PRODUCT WHERE BORROWER_TRANCHE_PRODUCT = ?) UNION select 'ALL', 'ALL PRODUCTS' FROM DUAL
SELECT ccy_code, ccy_name FROM cytms_ccy_defn WHERE ? = 'AL' UNION select '*.*', 'ALL CURRENCIES' FROM DUAL WHERE ? <> 'AL'

RAD_DATASOURCES.RELATION_WITH_PARENT: LBTBS_CONTRACT_BORROWERS.CONTRACT_REF_NO = LBTBS_TRANCHE_BORR_LIMIT_DET.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND LBTBS_CONTRACT_BORROWERS.VERSION_NO = LBTBS_TRANCHE_BORR_LIMIT_DET.VERSION_NO AND LBTBS_CONTRACT_BORROWERS.CUSTOMER_NO = LBTBS_TRANCHE_BORR_LIMIT_DET.BORROWER
